1.0.name: wordpress/friendz
1.0.description:
Friendz implements profiles, paginated and customizable user lists, and some characteristics of social networks, like friends and sets. It supports localization and pretty permalinks. Suggestions, bug reports and fixes (specially security & bug fixes) are welcomed. PHP 5 is required.

** Please note, this is still in development, final version is expected for June 30th. Sorry for the delay, had some family things come up. **

User Lists

Using Friendz, users become a important part of WordPress. If you run a site with WordPress, probably some users are authors, some are contributors, and most of them are only suscribers. With Friendz each user has his own profile, even if there are no public posts by that user.

Also, it is possible to browse in "user lists" (named "User Views" in the plugin). There is one user list included in Friendz: the "all registered users" view. You can easily define other views through the hooks used in
